devdoc.author: Rodrigo G칩mez Gentil, Antonio Cruz Su치rez

__callback(bytes32,string,bytes).details: Get the querys using the parameter myid

params._secretChoice: Sha3 hash of the choice made by player and a secret word

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setminBusinessFeePayment(uint256).details: Mostly for testing porpuse. It should be removed in final deployment or no modifiable by anyone

params.newMinBusinessFeePayment: new min amount of ETH to transfer to business

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Abstract contract that defines methods to add P2P functionality to Ethereum Gambling Games

__callback(bytes32,string,bytes).notice: Callback function to emit the events with the information we want.

cancelRound(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Abstract function to cancel an existing round providing the choice and the secret        with a commit-reveal scheme

cancelRoundSender(uint256).notice: Abstract function for the original creator to cancel an existing round        with a commit-reveal scheme

createSecretRound(bytes32).notice: Abstract function to create round with a commit-reveal scheme

joinSecretRound(uint256,uint256).notice: Abstract function to join to a round with a commit-reveal scheme

playSoloRound(uint256).notice: Abstract function to create a round playing against the blockchain.        Each game would have a different implementation

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

revealChoice(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Abstract function to reveal an existing round with a commit-reveal scheme

setminBusinessFeePayment(uint256).notice: Set the minimum amount of ETH to be transfered when collecting business fees

startGame().notice: When we have everything ready owner can start game so anyone can play. Also for restarting game after having stopped it

withdrawFunds(address).notice: Withdraw funds in case of an emergengy.

userdoc.notice: This is just a simple game for the TFM of the Master in Ethereum. Do not use betting real value since it may have some vulnerabilities. Further analysis and assurance is needed to take in production/main net.
